page.title: 01SUMMARY OF THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: { LANDSCAPE:BUILDINGS:}Semi-rural area with evidence of long occupation, certainly for 2000 years. There are Iron and Bronze Age camp and burial sites. Industrialisation with a variety of extractive industries has changed the landscape. Buildings vary from stone cottages to modern houses. { ECOLOGY:}The weather is Atlantic Maritime with cool summers mild winters. Plant life is mostly deciduous with coniferous plantations. The built environment is a balance of new houses and factories and dereliction of old industries and railways. { EMPLOYMENT:}5% are engaged in farming, mining and quarrying, over 30% in factory work but many commute by car to office jobs etc. elsewhere.
